mission.title: Prepare Yourself
mission.description: Find and get 1 zalium sword and a null

mission.title: Learning To Move (WASD)
mission.description: Press WASD and move a bit!

mission.title: Use the arrow keys
mission.description: Use the down arrow key to open the quest menu. Use the left and right arrow keys to navigate through the quest information. Press E to talk to the guard and complete the quest.

mission.title: Meet Zeryn
mission.description: Press WASD to move and go speak to your comrade Zeryn.(Press E to interact)

mission.title: Playing with fire
mission.description: Go back to Zeryn and spar with her.

mission.title: Food is essential!
mission.description: Go speak to the chef and try to get some food.

mission.title: Giving up, or not...
mission.description: Go back to Zeryn empty handed.(Press I to check your inventory)

mission.title: Resilience
mission.description: Go back to Zeryn to share the bread you gained.(Press I to check your inventory)
Go to your training with Sir Gideon.

mission.title: Discover What Fun Is
mission.description: Find 4 VIP Cards by talking to the villagers in Dunhaven.

mission.title: Speak with the Innkeeper
mission.description: You have found the 4 VIP Cards. Speak with the Innkeeper at Xeiv Treaty!

mission.title: The VIP Door
mission.description: Go and speak with the man infront of the VIP Door. Tell him the Innkeeper sent you there.
